messages.subject: Generosity- a thank you for you-
messages.msgSnippet: Yesterday I sent this to be  added to Cameron Lovejoy s book: Generosity is not giving me that which I need more than you do, but it is giving me that which
messages.messageBody:
Yesterday I sent this to be added to Cameron Lovejoy's book:

Generosity is not giving me that which I need more than you do, but it
is giving me that which you need more than I do.
Kahlil Gibran


This morning I am in the computer drinking my coffe while Brian is
playing with the kids when they come to deliver a box. They took the box
sent to Naruto and Gigi and I went back to the computer and I can hear
the laughter and excitment in the next room.
I came out and there it is the kids filling up with candy the Disney
Princesses Pez collection that they really wanted the other day.
I was stunned. Who sent it ???
How did the person know that it what my kids wanted?
To you our fairly godmother or godfather:
Thank you from the bottom of my heart. My kids truely loved it and
can't stop running around.
I am touched by your kindness and generosity.
I will blog later with pictures of the pez and the kids. The candy will
be half way gone by then I believe.
What a beautiful day. I feel so blessed to know people that care so
much.
Thank you is not enough.
You have made my kids very happy and I love you for that.
Sincerely,
Alex
